runbook_hits.title: 5xx Spike Checklist
runbook_hits.summary: # 5xx Spike Checklist  ## Symptoms - Elevated 5xx error rate - Increased latency p95 - Top failing endpoint(s)  ## Checks 1. Check recent deploys (last 30â€“60 minutes) 2. Check dependency health (DB, cache, downstream API

runbook_hits.title: DB Timeouts Mitigation
runbook_hits.summary: # DB Timeouts Mitigation  ## Symptoms - DB timeout errors - Increased request latency - Connection pool saturation  ## Checks 1. Check DB CPU / connections / locks 2. Check application connection pool limits 3. Identify

recommended_next_steps: Confirm if a deploy happened in the last 30 minutes
Check dependency health and error budgets
Inspect logs for top failing endpoint
